name: Drailiball
description:
Drailiball was inspired by pool, with a whole new set of rules conjured up to make a fun and compelling single player arcade-like experience. Drailiball has over 30 unique levels and three different game modes.

Drailiball is an Android app, with no microtransactions or ads. If you would like to support the creators, please pay what you can. If you're unable to financially support this project, you're more than welcome to download it for free. Follow KovaKreative on Facebook for updates on the latest games and other creative projects.
